name: Train Trader
description:
Trade Goods and Get Rich while Managing a fast Supply train in a post-apocalyptic underground world.

The goal is to get 150 Gold while avoiding angering cities by ignoring them and not paying them a visit! if 5 cities get angry you're fired!

Make sure to keep track of what cities needs and what they have excess off so you can make the best deals with people, accept and ignore deals trying to tip the scale to your side

Controls:

A-D | Left-Right Arrow Keys: 

To move the Player and change the map line

W-S | Up-Down Arrow Keys:

to put and pick up stuff from buildings
